name: py-setuptools-cpp

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: Simplified packaging for pybind11-based C++ extensions

dependencies.name: py-appdirs
dependencies.description:
A small Python module for determining appropriate platform-specific
dirs, e.g. a "user data dir".

dependencies.name: py-atomicwrites
dependencies.description: Atomic file writes.

dependencies.name: py-attrs
dependencies.description: Classes Without Boilerplate

dependencies.name: py-black
dependencies.description:
Black is the uncompromising Python code formatter. By using it, you
agree to cede control over minutiae of hand-formatting. In return, Black
gives you speed, determinism, and freedom from pycodestyle nagging about
formatting.

dependencies.name: py-certifi
dependencies.description:
Certifi: A carefully curated collection of Root Certificates for
validating the trustworthiness of SSL certificates while verifying the
identity of TLS hosts.

dependencies.name: py-chardet
dependencies.description: Universal encoding detector for Python 3

dependencies.name: py-click
dependencies.description: Python composable command line interface toolkit.

dependencies.name: py-colorama
dependencies.description: Cross-platform colored terminal text.

dependencies.name: py-coverage
dependencies.description: Testing coverage checker for python

dependencies.name: py-entrypoints
dependencies.description: Discover and load entry points from installed packages.

dependencies.name: py-flake8
dependencies.description:
Flake8 is a wrapper around PyFlakes, pep8 and Ned Batchelder's McCabe
script.

dependencies.name: py-importlib-metadata
dependencies.description: Read metadata from Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-isort
dependencies.description: A Python utility / library to sort Python imports.

dependencies.name: py-jinja2
dependencies.description:
Jinja2 is a template engine written in pure Python. It provides a Django
inspired non-XML syntax but supports inline expressions and an optional
sandboxed environment.

dependencies.name: py-markdown
dependencies.description:
This is a Python implementation of John Gruber's Markdown. It is almost
completely compliant with the reference implementation, though there are
a few very minor differences. See John's Syntax Documentation for the
syntax rules.

dependencies.name: py-markupsafe
dependencies.description:
MarkupSafe is a library for Python that implements a unicode string that
is aware of HTML escaping rules and can be used to implement automatic
string escaping. It is used by Jinja 2, the Mako templating engine, the
Pylons web framework and many more.

dependencies.name: py-mccabe
dependencies.description: Ned's script to check McCabe complexity.

dependencies.name: py-more-itertools
dependencies.description: Additions to the standard Python itertools package.

dependencies.name: py-mypy
dependencies.description: Optional static typing for Python.

dependencies.name: py-mypy-extensions
dependencies.description:
Experimental type system extensions for programs checked with the mypy
typechecker.

dependencies.name: py-packaging
dependencies.description: Core utilities for Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-pathspec
dependencies.description:
pathspec extends the test loading and running features of unittest,
making it easier to write, find and run tests.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-pluggy
dependencies.description: Plugin and hook calling mechanisms for python.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-tornado
dependencies.description: Tornado is a Python web framework and asynchronous networking library.

dependencies.name: py-typed-ast
dependencies.description: A fork of Python 2 and 3 ast modules with type comment support.

dependencies.name: py-wheel
dependencies.description: A built-package format for Python.

dependencies.name: python
dependencies.description: The Python programming language.

dependent_to.name: py-mxfold2
dependent_to.description:
MXfold2: RNA secondary structure prediction using deep learning with
thermodynamic integration
